QHome.text: Home : Select which information you want to consult

QhasSaveFile.text: Do you wish to load a save file ? (stored in the saves/ folder)

EfileName.text: Enter the name of your save file (without extension, put in the saves/ folder):

NdepositGold.text: How much gold do you want to deposit to your guild's treasury ?

IfileLoadError.text: Error loading save file. Starting a new game.

QquitGame.text: Do you wish to quit the game ?

IGoodMorning.text: Rise and shine everyone, a beautiful new day is upon us !

IMerchantIsHere.text: The merchant has arrived ! (1 gold = 1 ration)

NBuyFood.text: How many rations do you want to buy ?

ISelectMission.text: What mission should your (alive for now) adventurers take on ?

INoUnoccupiedAdventurers.text: Your adventurers are all occupied ! Moving on.

IMidday.text: As midday comes, you eagerly wait for the arrival of new potential recruits !

IEvening.text: As the sun sets, you tensly await your dear adventurers' return...

ISurvived.text: Congratulations, your guild managed to survive another day !

ILost.text: Your Guild has fallen, forever lost. Your dear adventurers are dead and remembered by no one. What a shame man.

INoMoreMissions.text: There are no more daily missions remaining.
